thread.section_title: Hilton Beijing Wangfujing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of Hilton Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: annamkh4
title: Great Hotel
text: Perfect location if you staying 3-4 nights. Close to the main shopping street, markets, mall and walking distance to the forbidden city. The staff at the hotel go above and beyond their daily duties to make sure your stay is as comfortable as possible! Very large beautiful rooms (king delux). Live music in the beautiful lobby almost every night. If ever back in Beijing will definitely stay here again.
